pages.title: Vault Rocks
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Vault Rocks$() are the primary resource required from the $(l:get_started/vault_altar)Vault Altar$() to create $(l:get_started/vault_crystals)Vault Crystals$(). These magical rocks can be found below $(#033dfc)Y: 11$() and can spawn $(#033dfc)once$() per chunk.$(br2)Upon finding , you can either smelt the $(#033dfc)Vault Rocks$()Vault Rock Ore$(), or fortune them for a chance at multiple $(#033dfc)Vault Rocks$().
Once you have obtained your first batch of Vault rocks, you can find more inside $(#033dfc)the Vault$() hidden away in places where Ores spawn.
